content.question: The graph of <math alttext="f prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, the derivative of the continuous function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, is shown above on the interval <math alttext="negative 3 is less than x, which is less than 7" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true about <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="negative 3 is less than x, which is less than 7" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has three relative extrema, and the graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has one point of inflection.

<math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has three relative extrema, and the graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has four points of inflection.

<math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has four relative extrema, and the graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has two points of inflection.

<math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has four relative extrema, and the graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has four points of inflection.

content.answer: <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has four relative extrema, and the graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has four points of inflection.

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
